# Udacity Blockchain Course Project 5

### Test and deploy

Smart contract codes take place in `./smart_contracts`.
```
cd smart_contracts

# Install required packages
npm install
npm install -g truffle

# Compile
truffle compile

# Deploy
truffle migrate --network [rinkeby | ganache]

# Test
truffle test

# Test coverage
node_modules/.bin/solidity-coverage
```
**Note: You have to create a `secrets.json` file with account's mnemonic to deploy on ganchae or rinkeby**

### Contract deployed on Rinkeby

* Contract address: [0x7bbf6cf910827ca1ebf3a5e6952e94f9fb570864](https://rinkeby.etherscan.io/address/0x7bbf6cf910827ca1ebf3a5e6952e94f9fb570864)
* Token Id: `0`
* Transaction hash of `createStar`: [0x7ce77cdc53245444b0b9bfd7a8fd88e54ac4426a543930a4a161f06d0cecc679](https://rinkeby.etherscan.io/tx/0x7ce77cdc53245444b0b9bfd7a8fd88e54ac4426a543930a4a161f06d0cecc679)
* Transaction hash of `putStarUpForSale`: [0x9f5f1764d8b7dddb67dc34e34c8211f86b4166401c8d9a22d15617f93e5deeb2](https://rinkeby.etherscan.io/tx/0x9f5f1764d8b7dddb67dc34e34c8211f86b4166401c8d9a22d15617f93e5deeb2)
